text: Paahi etu, iphome ya Kuristo ihanaa machiri chinene o unihapiha! Ukhalhawaya wo machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku nolhokelha mahuku o uhimalha, Kuristo aheekumiha mwanene wa Nlhuku akhalhe isadaka itiminre. Ni iphome awe inoonihapiha mirima chihu cho uhilhoka chinommwiiha nookhwa, nikhalhe attu anovara ntheko wa Nlhuku ri nkumi.
